name: Q. How many programmers does it take to change a light bulb?
race: A. None – It’s a hardware problem

name: Q. Why do programmers always mix up Halloween and Christmas?
Q. How did the programmer die in the shower?
race: A .He read the shampoo bottle instructions: Lather. Rinse. Repeat.

name: Q.Why did the programmer quit his job?
race: A. Because he didn’t get arrays.

name: Q. Have you heard about the object-oriented way to become wealthy?
